name: Saint Snow
description: Saint Snow was a school idol group formed and led by Sarah Kazuno in Love Live! Sunshine!! until its disbandment in the ninth episode of the anime's second season. They are depicted as the rival group of Aqours. They wish to follow in µ's' and A-RISE's footsteps by winning the Love Live! competition. They come from Seisen Girls' Academy, which is an elite high school for the wealthy with a long history. They originally debuted with the song SELF CONTROL!!. Their fans are called . Their unit color is red.
